title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Hidden crimes: UCR data, and what’s not there
description: Examines the FBI’s Uniform Crime Report, cautioning users about its limitations and potential misuses, particularly in regards to hiding crimes and manipulating data to make cities appear safer.
